channel.title: april on it's my life
channel.description: Recent content in april on it's my life

item.title: Rush April
item.description: This month I’m really busy with university. In the Netherlands I had a lot of assignments, specially the ones about programming, and I could arrange my schedule and do the shopping, the ironing and so on. Back in Madrid the things are different. Most subjects have a more or less complex lab assignment, with three hours lab session, previous theoric work and afterwards you have to submit a report about what you’ve seen (or not) in the lab.
